resources.string:
My name is Alessandro Mana.

I am an Experienced Blogger with a demonstrated history of working in the music industry. My passion for new technologies contributed to fifteen successful years as a musician and promoter.

I have always been fond of all kinds of music and how new technologies can influence people of different cultures to enjoy music in different ways.

My desire to be part of the changing way in which people experience music led to my certifications as an Android Developer, exploring the interface between software engineering and entertainment.
